OCD.name: Ohaus Proxy
OCD.description: Provides proxy connection and data transfer of measurements from Ohaus Corporation Series 3000 Weigh indicators

AD.name: Connection uri
AD.description: URI to connect to the balance. Example socket://192.168.0.116:2345

AD.name: Wiring group name
AD.description: Name of the group of iRouter components that will be wired together. (If no iRouter functionality is required this value is ignored.)

AD.name: Connection retry interval seconds
AD.description: Seconds to wait before retrying to establish a connection to the balance.

AD.name: Response delay interval in milliseconds
AD.description: If no data was received from the scale the milliSeconds to wait before checking again.

AD.name: Response retries before abort
AD.description: Number of times to listen for a scale response before aborting the connection.

AD.name: Producer Scope
AD.description: Name of the product created by this wire producer and sent to wire consumers.

AD.name: Minimum Weight Threshold
AD.description: Value of the minimum weight before a mesurement product is produced. The unit of measurement is the one configured in the indicator.

AD.name: Component container label
AD.description: Name to label node in the iRouter Monitor View graphics.

AD.name: Description
AD.description: The description for Ohaus proxy instance created with these options. This is used in various places like logging.
